name: Dark Drake Crest
effects: Increase resistance to Ice, Water, Earth and Dark by 30% for 3 turns to all allies

desc_long: Boosts ice, water, earth, and dark resistance for all allies.
提高全體隊員冰水土暗屬性耐性的數值。
아군 전체의 얼음, 물, 땅, 어둠속성 저항력이 상승합니다.
